channel.title: Call Of Duty 4 2
channel.description:
Due to popular demand, I have created a MW2 thread so you guys who are discussing how awesome the game is on a thread protesting the lack of dedicated servers can do so in ease.
Campaign-wise, the American levels were explosive fun, but the 141 levels often left you with few or no friends, who could not protect you from swarms of screaming communists. Still too short, and the story was underdeveloped, but it was fun from a gameplay perspective.
Spec-Ops mostly felt like time trial versions of all the levels, but the vehicle ones and the reduxs of COD4 were all fun.
On Multiplayer, the lack of dedicated servers is pretty bad, and I noticed several connection errors that were total BS. Gameplay wise, none of the weapons were as overpowered as I have thought they would have been, but some of the killstreaks (AC-130, PaveLow, and Harrier, to be exact) felt really unbalanced.
So all in all, I was pleasantly surprised. Good job IW.
[img]https://callofdutyblog.com/wp-content/uploads/2009/06/modern_warfare_2.jpg[/img]

item.description:
Killer_Chimp:

ok so the game is great i love the spec ops (i beat the op where you have to kill fifteen jugarnuts on veteran) and the story as a bit too short… the online is great except for the fact that there is no dedicated servers which causes lag and there is a stupid thing where it has to find a new host. other then that the game is awesome!!!

There is no need for you to befoul the forums with such nonsense

item.title: Call Of Duty 4 2
item.dc:creator: JohnKiller118
item.description:
I meant on the matchma… fuck it.

Anyway, I’m rethinking my opinion on what you’re referring to, or rather how to present it. I realize now that I was REALLY digging at the bottom of the barrel for “good” arguments, to the point where I was just generalization and too “in your face.”
I still stand by my beliefs, but I’ll try to be less of a self ratious dick about it. I’ll go no further talking about it though.

Back on topic:
Great. IW’s shitty programming is at it again!
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0PsLNsI1W8w
They better patch it.

Read full topic

item.title: Call Of Duty 4 2
item.dc:creator: JohnKiller118
item.description:
Master Chef:

Rust is only on small playlists like cage match, FFA, and sometimes on Mecenary TDM. Its great for sprinting in circles with a Spas-12. It’s basically how that one Russian map with all the shipping crates in COD 4 should have been.

Oh. Makes sense.

I checked the “Choose Map” thing in the Private Games, and it turns out I’ve played on all of them.
So yeah, the matchmaking system isn’t fucked up, I just need to stop bitching.

Read full topic
